fields.description:
To reproduce:
1. Install and run KS> Platform> XHR> File Upload

Actual result:
No progress bar

Expected:
Should see the download process in progress bar
fields.summary: iOS7: File Upload - the progress bar is not visible due to the wrong color

comments.body: This must have been apple bug in the initial releases . Tested with Xcode 5 DP 3 and iPad 4th gen running iOS 7 DP 3

Closing as cannot reproduce - could be an Apple bug
